contexts.title: Enterprise SSO rollout
contexts.context: A mid-size enterprise is standardizing authentication across 40 internal apps. They need SSO, MFA, and a migration plan that minimizes downtime for different departments and partner teams.

cases.title: Staged SSO migration plan
cases.task: Design a phased rollout plan for enabling SSO across all internal apps while keeping legacy logins operational during transition.

cases.title: MFA adoption metrics
cases.task: Propose success metrics and monitoring for MFA adoption across multiple departments with different risk profiles.

cases.title: Partner access strategy
cases.task: Outline an access strategy for external partners who need limited app access without full employee accounts.

contexts.title: Fintech budgeting assistant
contexts.context: A consumer fintech app wants to launch an AI budgeting assistant that reviews transactions, suggests goals, and nudges users to save without overstepping privacy expectations.

cases.title: Trust-building onboarding
cases.task: Design the onboarding flow to explain how the budgeting assistant uses data and gains user trust.

cases.title: Nudge strategy
cases.task: Create a nudge strategy for users who overspend in key categories without causing alert fatigue.

cases.title: Goal personalization
cases.task: Define how the assistant should personalize savings goals based on income volatility and irregular expenses.

contexts.title: Marketplace returns optimization
contexts.context: A marketplace is struggling with high return rates and slow refunds. They want to improve the returns experience while reducing operational costs.

cases.title: Self-serve return labels
cases.task: Improve the self-serve return label flow so customers can complete it in under two minutes.

cases.title: Refund timing transparency
cases.task: Design a status and notification system that makes refund timelines clear and reduces support tickets.

cases.title: Seller incentives
cases.task: Create an incentive program for sellers to reduce return rates without penalizing customer satisfaction.

contexts.title: Brand marketing site refresh
contexts.context: A consumer electronics brand wants to refresh its marketing site to better showcase new products, capture leads, and boost newsletter signups.

cases.title: Homepage hero strategy
cases.task: Define a homepage hero strategy that balances product storytelling with lead capture.

cases.title: Product comparison
cases.task: Design a product comparison experience for three new devices with overlapping features.

cases.title: Newsletter incentives
cases.task: Create a newsletter incentive plan that grows signups without discounting premium positioning.

contexts.title: Public API platform
contexts.context: A developer platform is launching a public API for analytics. They need onboarding docs, rate limits, and monitoring to support third-party integrations.

cases.title: API onboarding flow
cases.task: Outline the onboarding flow for developers to generate keys, read docs, and make their first successful request.

cases.title: Rate limit policy
cases.task: Design a rate-limit policy and UX that balances free-tier access with abuse prevention.

cases.title: Incident communications
cases.task: Create an incident communication plan for API outages that keeps developers informed without overwhelming them.

contexts.title: Healthcare appointment scheduling
contexts.context: A healthcare provider wants to reduce no-shows and improve patient experience for scheduling visits across multiple clinics.

cases.title: Appointment reminders
cases.task: Design a reminder cadence that reduces no-shows while respecting patient preferences and regulations.

cases.title: Rescheduling flow
cases.task: Improve the rescheduling flow so patients can adjust appointments without calling the clinic.

cases.title: Care team visibility
cases.task: Define how care teams should see scheduling status without exposing sensitive patient data.

contexts.title: EdTech learning platform
contexts.context: An EdTech platform wants to improve course completion rates by blending live sessions with asynchronous lessons and better progress tracking.

cases.title: Progress visibility
cases.task: Design a progress dashboard that motivates learners without overwhelming them.

cases.title: Live session scheduling
cases.task: Create a scheduling flow for live sessions that accounts for time zones and learner availability.

cases.title: Completion incentives
cases.task: Propose incentives and checkpoints that improve course completion without gaming the system.
